alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 18 at 2:09PM MDT until April 19 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations 1 t 3 inches at lower elevations and 6 to 12 inches in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 6 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Near blizzard conditions are possible tonight.
info.instruction: To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine
